name: income
title: 8. When you consider your current household income from all sources, would you say that you are...
description: DEMOGRAPHICS: 8. When you consider your current household income from all sources, would you say that you are...
encodings: 1=Comfortable|2=Have just enough to make ends meet|3=Do NOT have enough to make ends meet|4=Don't know or refused to answer

name: employment
title: 9. Which of the following best describes your current employment (work) situation?
description: DEMOGRAPHICS: 9. Which of the following best describes your current employment (work) situation?
encodings: 1=Employed for wages|2=Self-employed|3=Out of work for more than 1 year|4=Out of work for less than 1 year|5=Homemaker|6=Student|7=Retired|8=Unable to work (for health or disability reasons)|10=Other|9=Don't know or refused to answer

name: marital_status
title: 10. What is your marital status?
description: DEMOGRAPHICS: 10. What is your marital status?
encodings: 1=Married|2=Divorced|3=Widowed|4=Separated|5=Never Married|6=A member of an unmarried couple|7=Don't Know or refused to answer

name: education
title: 11. What is the highest grade or level of schooling that you completed?
description: DEMOGRAPHICS: 11. What is the highest grade or level of schooling that you completed?
encodings: 1=8th grade or less|2=Some high school|3=High School or GED|4=Technical trade or business school|5=2-year college degree or some college|6=4-year college degree|7=Post-graduate degree (e.g., masters or doctorate)|8=Don't know or refused to answer

name: little_do
title: a. Little interest or pleasure in doing things
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: a. Little interest or pleasure in doing things
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

name: feel_down
title: b. Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: b. Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: c. Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: d. Feeling tired or having little energy
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

name: poor_eating
title: e. Poor appetite or overeating
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: e. Poor appetite or overeating
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

name: let_down
title: f. Feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure, or have let yourself or family down
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: f. Feeling bad about yourself or that you are a failure, or have let yourself or family down
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

name: con_things
title: g. Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: g. Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

name: move_usual
title: h. Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed.  Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: h. Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed.  Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
encodings: 0=0 Not at all|1=1 Several days|2=2 More than half the days|3=3 Nearly every day

name: phq8_questions
title: PHQ8 Total
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: PHQ8 Total[calculation: sum([little_do],[feel_down],[fall_sleep],[tired_energy],[poor_eating],[let_down],[con_things],[move_usual])]

name: groc_quest
title: 18. Please rate the overall condition of your pain from the time that you began treatment until now (Indicate only one):
description:
17. Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ8)

How often during the past two weeks were you bothered by: 18. Please rate the overall condition of your pain from the time that you began treatment until now (Indicate only one):
encodings: 1=Quite a bit worse|2=Moderately worse|3=Somewhat worse|4=A little bit worse|5=A tiny bit worse|6=About the same|7=A tiny bit better|8=A little bit better|9=Somewhat better|10=Moderately better|11=Quite a bit better
